price.title: Affordable, transparent pricing for your learning journey!
price.contact: for to contact our support team.
price.contact_2: You can test the subscriptions and won't be charged.
price.faq_detail: Explore our comprehensive FAQ to find quick answers about our AI-powered learning platform. If you need further assistance, don't hesitate to contact us for personalized help.

marketing.title: The Learning Revolution: AI-powered personalized learning for everyone.
marketing.sub_title: Your complete All-in-One solution for personalized, AI-driven education.
marketing.sub_features: AI-powered: Revolutionizing education and enhancing learning experiences for students worldwide.
marketing.price_features: Cost-effective for learners of all levels.
marketing.blog_description: 1FOR1Leaning is a personalized learning platform that uses AI to help you learn faster and better.
marketing.wobble_card_description: We are committed to continually improving our education platform and providing the best possible resources for learners of all levels and all over the world.
marketing.wobble_card_description_2: When creating this education platform, we had several guiding principles in mind.
marketing.wobble_card_title_3: Streamline Your Education Development with 1FOR1Leaning’s Platform.
marketing.wobble_card_description_3: Our education platform embodies this expertise, empowering both our team and clients to build high-quality education services faster and easier.
marketing.questions_1: 1FOR1Leaning is an AI-powered personalized learning platform designed to enhance your educational experience. It adapts to your learning style, pace, and goals to provide a tailored learning journey.
marketing.questions_2: 1FOR1Leaning uses advanced AI algorithms to analyze your learning patterns, strengths, and areas for improvement. It then creates a customized curriculum and recommends resources that best suit your needs, ensuring an efficient and effective learning process.
marketing.questions_3_title: What subjects or courses are available on 1FOR1Leaning?
marketing.questions_3: 1FOR1Leaning offers a wide range of subjects and courses, from academic disciplines to professional skills. Our platform continuously expands its content library to meet diverse learning needs. You can explore specific subjects or follow curated learning paths tailored to your goals.
marketing.comments_subtitle: Don’t just take our word for it. Here’s what real people are saying about 1FOR1Leaning.
marketing.personalized_learning_desc: Tailored learning paths and adaptive exercises for each student's unique needs.
marketing.ai_professor_desc: 24/7 AI-powered guidance and support to enhance your learning experience.
marketing.one_stop_shop_desc: Comprehensive library of learning materials and integrated tools for seamless education.
marketing.progress_tracking_desc: Detailed analytics and personalized recommendations to optimize your learning journey.
